Class ListComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.ListComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, FixedComponent

    public class ListComponent
extends HUDComponent
    HUD component that consists of a list of strings.
